newsitem.title: UK: ACPC confident of Mexico, Guatemala membership.
newsitem.headline: ACPC confident of Mexico, Guatemala membership.

text.p: The Association of Coffee Producing Countries (ACPC) said on Monday it was confident both Mexico and Guatemala would eventually join the group.
"I am sure we will convince them (to join the ACPC) in the short-term," ACPC Secretary General Roberio Oliviera Silva told reporters outside a meeting of the International Coffee Organization (ICO).
Mexico on Friday reaffirmed it had no intention of joining the ACPC's quota scheme and Guatemala said its coffee officials would not attend the meeting.

When asked if the rejections by Guatemala and Mexico could affect the ACPC unit, Oliviera said: "I am sure we can convince the government and the private sector that being within the ACPC is more beneficial than being outside of it."
